topics.body:
Friendly reminder that "this":http://space.galaxybuster.net/ site exists.

It's a fun little website where you send notes that will be given to another user at any point in time with no explanation as to who you are or why you wrote it. ~Unless, you know, you put those things.~ Sometimes, you get cute ones, sometimes you get sad ones, sometimes you get stupid ones. It's pretty therapeutic.

I want to hug everything
Everything's just so warm and fuzzy feeling
Even the dated video quality gives me that Saturday morning cartoon fuzzy feeling[/bq]
What did these old subbers use for the Video to look like that? (The Damekko Doubutsu anime only came out in 2005.)
